title: Ruthenium-doped Ni(OH)2 to enhance the activity of methanol oxidation reaction and promote the efficiency of hydrogen production
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,18695-18702
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02181A, Paper

Jiajie Lin, Jie Chen, Changhui Tan, Yingzhen Zhang, Yancai Li
Ru/Ni(OH)2/NF nanocomposites were in situ grown on nickel foam, which exhibits excellent electrocatalytic activity and high selectivity for methanol oxidation in an alkaline electrolyte.
